answers.answer: Were you tested for any kind of hearing loss? Do the voices impact your reality testing or they just sounds? If someone has hearing loss they can have tinnitus and just hear sounds? Did they explain why they believed it to be psychiatric?
perhaps you need to see a psychiatrist again :)

question: I am 78 year old Man . I  cannot hear properly  as My ear has damaged and may not be cure. I use hearing Aid but of No use . Its being few months  I have started a problam of  hearing some noices from inside which upsent me and also make me uneasy during day and night . The voices are like some machines are working and sothing like ghuuuu.......... . Sometime When I relax my body , the voices start . I am undergoing treatment of Psychistric for 5 months, but These are not helpful. I feel very uneasy during night as these voices not let me sleep properly , I also use sleeping pills. I am an old patint of Diabetes and Blood Pressu for which I take medicine regularly. Please consult me wheather there is any treatment for this .
title: Medical Assistance
